values:
Well hello.
It has been pretty much 2 months since I have even been on this thing... give or take a few days. It's nothing like that myspace... or that facebook...or anything else we all pull out of our asses. =o

Well,as you all know, I'm not very good at computer things... or getting up to date. because i dont like computers all too much but i will tell you what I really do like to do. I like to sit in samis basement... and listen to sami rap... or hear her talk to me in robot....

or i like going to taco bell (a.k.a- place of employment) and hearing sami yell out very.... vile naughty things out the window when it really isnt appropriate. You know. And..... I like to go on long drives leading no where while Sami Nate and James are in the car.  And run away from cops for no reason... just because james says to dip.

its all fun. because they all make me smile.
and make my life a little different from yours.


and i love laughing at sami when she makes this gasping for breath sound while shes laughing...
which makes me laugh harder because i make her laugh harder...

and i like it when she yells at people who dont make any sence.
and being with her all the time because she is the only best person for me...
always has been.
always will be.
<3.

It doesn't feel like christmas is coming up this coming Monday.
It feels like any other day...any other week.
I've realized that the older I get the more everything just loses it meaning.
It never feels like a holiday anymore (for me)
it never feels like my birthday
or the last day of school.
Everyday just seems like every other day.

Anyways...
me and sami like to go on dates together
so we are.

Sami (minus a few others)
has really been here for me to keep my head screwed on
Everytime I think I might lose it
Sami's there to let me steam.
I'm constantly scared that she's going to have enough of me sooner or later
but so far she's just been there it that means so much.
...She makes me happy when nothing or no one else can.
Thank you sami.

Fuck family.
I was hoping to have family to help me through this all.
but I know that i can stand strong on my own two legs
I don't need them to know that I will grow
and change
without them.
And when I make my own successful life
and they want to join me in my glory
and remonice on how they helped me get where i am today
Ill give them a big FUCK YOU...
because they didn't...


a great fuck'n day
kTHANX

Halloween was good stuff
I had soo much fun and
Nate and Shawn pry had the ....
I don't what words I want to use for their costumes.

if i had a camera i woulda taken pictures
but i don't so it doesnt really look like im going to post them.

here's to no sleep!

and yet;
i still wish i could have made it to allll the parties.

Isn't it crazy how the slightest touches...
or the slightest looks
or the itsiest bit of ANYTHING
can just bring you back.


I'm so confused but its a happy confused.
I feel this spirt of confidence but I feel as though...
even though the certain situation is horid to think ...
That I want to put myself there,
and I want to get shot down
or get swept off my feet...
but more than anything, i just want hang out with him...
show him either way; no matter what i or he feels;
i can be his friend.

it all happened soo fast
the rush of feelings the memories gave me.


i love not knowing....

:)

oh shit! whatwhat.

I don't know what I liked better about this weekend...
The fact that I didn't do anything,
The fact that I worked the whole time,
or the fact that I had to fight with someone I care about the entire time.

All I really need is a nice big cup of French Vanilla Cappi. but 
I really don't even have the money for that.

But good news! I get my first paycheck tomorrow.
That I have to use the entire check on my car.
YAY! 

"My man's gotta heart like a rock that's in the sea"

I hate having the greatest intentions about things but having them all blow up in your face. I hate just wanting to cuddle and sleep next to someone you care about but having them just push you away. I hate feeling like you need to get away from the one person that you want to be closest to. I'm going to be alone again so woohoo boys live it up.
haha.

i miss all of you.

p.s: sami kt beka jay kel reg ash em sars and if i invitied anyone else for my senior pix please don't forget to be at pier marqutte on the other side of the pier at 7. Please don't forget..
because i love you guys and i really want you to be in them
<3.

Everything has been so different lately. With the baby here and school; I seriously thought that this school year was going be fuckin awsome. I guess it's fine. I'm doing everything that I know I need to do this year to meet my satifaction, but who knows how long I'll keep that one up. I guess the fact that I hardly have friends around anymore, it helps me focus on the things that really need to get done. 

I never sleep anymore, which is great. The baby sleeps right under me in the basement and whenever he's up, you can expect that I'm up, just waiting for someone to get up and change, hold, or comfort him. So, basically, I'm just real fuckin tired. I have 8 hours of school this year. My zero hour, my normal 6 hours, and then I took up a seventh hour. My seventh hour isn't anything big but writing everything in my planner seems like soo much. 

Every single friend that I had over this summer isn't around. The only person I've actually been talking to is Ashlie. I should count my blessings that I have someone around. My parents suck, the only thing I want to do is get out of this house but really I'm not sure where I would go after I left.
So.. does anyone want to be my friend... like actually my friend.

Sorry I'm so god damn negative this entry around but it's kinda hard when you feel like you've got no one around.
Divorces suck. You're parents try to find an outlet and soon nothing matters but their outlet, everyone's wrong but them, everything's a fight. 
Blah.

herabgdkjfdfjetgjseudkjdfjndjjjdkfjdfjbadfjbalfjfkjnvakjdfv.

It's crazy that you've got a thousand things to say but you're so mad at everything that you can't find the words to say shit.
I'm gunna start calling old friends because I miss having people that care.

Don't you hate it when you know something fucked up is about to happen but you just don't know what the fuck it is yet?

yah...
me too...

I'm glad that I left when I did. 
I'm glad I took the chance of leaving home for a lil while to see my little guy.
I miss my friends already though.

Don't have tooo much fun without me.
At least tell me that y'all miss me.


blah 
I love you guys.

to prove yourself to be better than my attempt at flight

I will leap

and
You'll

See

Comming!!"

So what do you do when the only person you ever expected to be there falls through?
What do you do when the one person you love won't give you the love you need?
What do you do when you do nothing but fight?
What do you do if there was never any trust?
What do you do when you look at old boyfriends and think about how much better he was to you than your present boyfriend?
What happens when you try everything to please this one person but it never seems like enough?
What happens when the only thing you want to do is just erase the only person you ever fell in love with from your head so this game that he plays just stops hurting so damn much?
What happens when you're up at 430 in the morning; alone, wondering why your boyfriend is staying the night at another girls house?

I guess there's all answers to those. Everyone knew that this wasn't going to work out. Even he looked you straight in the eye and said "We're not going to make it, are we?"
How do you answer that?
I guess for a lot of people it would be easy.
It's getting easier... as the days go on, as the memories start to fade.
Anyone can call me while I'm away just to see how things are going and all. 
ANYONE CAN!
Trust me, my guess is that I'm going to be a little lonely.

"I would be lying if I said that things could never get rough
and all this cliche motivation
It could never be enough
I could stand here all night 
Trying to convince you
But what good would that do
my offer stands and 
YOU
MUST
CHOOSE!!"

The only problem I have right now is that I'm at home ...
Alone
just chillin' all by my lonesum.

Someone should call me
<3

Friends are fucking great!
Em, Alyssa, Sami: I love you girls. 
(and of course I love all my other friends too)

Life is wonderful!

I love you, boyfriend!

I don't know if anyone could ever know how one person or the other could possibly feel in a certain moment in time... but I have to ask, has anyone ever felt what it's like to feel like everything you've ever know was just kinda... crumbeling. 
     It's funni because the moment I typed that out, I wasn't thinking about my situation, but in the past week, what about 4 to 5 of my other friends must be feeling about how things are going on in there lives. It seems like this is just a bad last 10 days for a lot of people. I guess in my case, the whole summer has gone on and off a bit sour. 
     I don't expect anyone to read this but I really just feel like typing...
     Well, I guess you never really know how greatful you are to have parents that are together until they decide one fateful day that they can't stand to stay together; they're "co-exhisting", if you've ever heard a term so well put. I guess since i've heard the news i've kinda of felt like... what's the use? You know. It's like, how many people do you see happily together anymore. How many people do you know that had what it took to stay in love. Deal with the person you loved so much before, for the rest of their un-natural lives. No one. There is hardly anyone anymore. They all just don't want to deal with it. Their careers, their social life, EVERYTHING ELSE is more important than working on that relationship that you vowed to never leave eachothers sides. It kinda makes you want to lose hope. The little hope that I did have. I mean, I have always thought that I would be the only one out of all of us that would never get married. Never have any kids. You know, until just recently I thought maybe I'd want something like that one day. I realized how quickly I would be whilling to give up some of my dreams to be with someone I could quite possibly love for the rest of my life. I'm not having any epiphanies here, what I'm asking is, is it worth it? Is it worth it to vow yourself to one person for the rest of your life? Is it worth it to fall in love and than after 24 some odd years of marriage one of you decides that you just can't handel it and wants you and your kids to move out by the end of the year?
      To be honest, I really just don't know. If, let's say, within the next five years someone I truly cared about bent down on one knee and asked for my hand in marriage would I say yes? Well it sure as hell would be something to think about wouldn't it! Can you say, well let me sleep on it, I'll get back to you in a few days? I think that might ruin the whole "moment" effect he would have been looking for. 
     I don't know. I mean, why should I even worry about that now? I mean, I'm not getting married any time soon. I'm going through a terrible break-up between the only two people I have ever relied on to be constant in my life. Friends have never been a constant thing...school, grades, jobs; all VERY irregular, all whilling to change. I mean, think about it, the one thing you never expect to change is the way you plan on comming home everyday. They've always been there, it was always a together thing and now I feel as if they're kinda...dickin with my whole schedule...my routine. It almost feels babyish to feel terrible over but like I said, it doesn't just bring up one thing, which is divorce, but what will happen to me, what will happen  to both of them, where will all of us go? 
      Who cares right? It's no ones concern really, it's just that I feel like typing and  I guess this is just what's on my mind.

     On a lighter note I suppose. Within the next week I will be an Aunt. Yes me. To a Rylan Paul ZaGara. How exciting right? I think so. I can put my spare energy into him and take my mind off of distant relationships from all three big catergories on my mind. I'll be SUCH a good aunt.
     I guess the boyfriends comming home again too. I mean this is the first time he's gone by the "10 away four at home" theory but at least he's comming home. Everytime I mention that I have a long-distance relationship everyone always asks me how I do it and how they could never do it, it'd be "too hard". It's almost nice. It keeps me in check you know. It helps me remind myself that I can't let him be all I'm left with because I know I need my friends. With him gone a lot and my friends being around a lot let's me know that they will always be there for me and I need to keep them around as much as possible. Keep the people that are always there, forever there. I know that I am absolutly nothing without my friends. They have all helped shape me in one way or another, and I appriciate that greatly.
     Well I guess this is the best time to just stop, maybe I'll write another netry in another 6 months er so when I actually do get on my computer. 

<3
+ To All My Heros Who'll Never Die +

There he goes, she thinks, the only one I have ever loved. I have always loved you and I always will...

Please don't leave me...

 And he said before he turned and ran away from a million things he already knew "we're amazing. No matter what we're always here, we're always talking, always finding one another even though we're at completely opposite sides of the road."

"I know you'll end up forgetting about me"
 
"How could I forget you?"



i.love.you

I'm a harsh person.  I AM the type of person that will strike back when you say shit to me. I guess viscious is the word for me but, fuck, it's what I am. Take it or leave. Although I guess I should have it tattooed to my head because people get all upset and suprised when the hear what I have to say BACK to them.

I'm harsh. I will NOT, I REFUSE, to regaurd to YOUR feelings when you don't give a shit about mine. 

Say all you want but I was ALWAYS grateful when I was given things but let it be known that I never expected it. And just because someone GIVES ME something, doesn't mean that I won't gaurd myself when someone says something hurtful to me. 

I have my own life and I will do what I please with it. I will fall for who I fall for, I won't hide it because someone else likes me. That would just be stupid. I'm a GOOD friend. I know I am. Don't hurt me over nothing. Because that is all it is or was; NOTHING. Maybe we all learned a lesson from this, talking to the person before accusing or saying what you think. It should be a face - to - face thing because any other way, someone could take something wrong... or possibly hurt them more. 

I guess the theme of this story is don't hurt my feelings unless you want yours to get hurt worse.

FUCK!

What do you do when every single thing around you seems to go wrong? When everything that you have come to love seems to be shinning in a totally new light. Where the people that you thought couldn't give a shit are there more than the people that you thought would be there through the thickest and thinnest. When life comes at you just a little too fast. When your world has seemed to be knocked off its axis. When you don't feel like you could ever take on the things that are coming at you now. The truth is that I don't know what I'm doing or what I'm thinking or where the fuck it is I'm going with this, but I know that I'm tired all the time now. And I know that when I sleep, I seem to miss just enough to not know where my life went when I open my eyes again. So I'm going to find A way to stay awake forever. Because too much of my life is wasted on sleeping. 

And when I know in the end that I'm the one that will lose. It kills me. Because I will be the only one weeping for myself. The only one...

...And now I know I walk to a whole new beat..

I feel like death. I'm terribley sad and overtaken. I'm going insane trying to feel out what or who is right for me. It's too close to the end of my past and the beginning to my new to make such big decisions right now. I'll try and stay content with everything I have right now and blind myself from what I think I see. For all I know.... it's a mirage. And that' s exactly what I'll keep it as. A figmant of my imagination. Because the thing about your imagination is that you can alter whatever it is that you find displeasing. I'll pretend that I'm happy with everyone... all of you..

.. I have no enemies.


Cause All We Know Is Falling
 It Falls

Love All Of You
P.S: That's a lie
Only some of you.
Kbye.

So I know that it has been literally FOREVER since I've written in this thing;
I guess you could say that I just forgot about it. 


I'm so caught up in life right now and I'm just so happy.
I guess you can really say that everything really does happen for a reason.
I always get so sad when something happens and I think its terrible and i just sit and wonder "why is this happening to me"
But in all reality, its fate knocking at your noggin saying "HELLO! Don't you realize what i've done for you?"
And as soon as the pain comes; it goes, because something or someone beautiful just ends up walking right into your life and you say "Thank all that's holy for fate".

I'm actually happi that me and that one thing didn't work out. I don't think I would've been completly happy with him. He didn't want all the same things that I wanted anyways. 
Now i just need to find someone who has the same grocery list. 


I don't know why,exactly, that I'm so happy now-a-days.
I think its just so silly to be sad all the time about petty things now.
I guess that's just me growing up though. 
I'm not 13 anymore or any other number leading up to 17.
You've got to take those things that are just causing the drama, causing you access stress that you just don't need,
and let it all go. Put it all behind you because in the end.... it could always be worse.

Last night I realized, if i'm around the right person, I can just talk about everything for hours
and never feel stupid or scared to say anything because that fact is totally irelivant.

Just to let you all know. I love all my friends so deeply; I'd die without you.
I love my new friends and I hold my old closer to my heart than anyone could know.

P<3S: I daydream about things I wish to come; please let it be true, please let it be true.

<center> It only hurts when I'm home alone

 

 

Does anyone else feel like something's out of place? Something's not right here.

The bruses that lie within will haunt my shadow and look beside me in the mirror. So what do i do? Im screaming for a way out im cry; somehow dying. Im wrapped in the sorrow and binded with a smile...

Who saved me but him, the one that began the cycle of hurt. The only person that can make you stop hurting, is the person that hurt you in the first place. When I look at him is when I fall the hardest. He doesn't have to say anything at all and I know he cares. He makes me forget about the one person that made it hard for me to trust. I still don't trust, I have issues I know, but maybe someday I'll be able to get over that. 

Maybe someday I'll be as happy as I know I can be. Get over this whole thing and just trust him. I feel like I can't do it but I know I can. He goes out of his way for me and I try and help him with what I can. I try to be there. 

I must remember; staying happy is key. As long as he makes me happy, I think everything will be okay.

Now to the next issue.... what happened?

I'm SO incredibley happy!

It's insane how the MOMENT that you stop looking for everything you ever wanted, it all falls right in your lap. It's the truth too, I was so done with everything and I was like "It's okay, I know I can be okay alone" and the moment I thought it, and actually believed it, I was just over- whelmed with what was put right there in front of me:finally:happiness

I haven't been THIS happy in such a long time. I still get little butterflies in my stomache and I jump around when I know he's coming to see me. No one else... just me <3. He makes me feel like I'm the most important person in the world. He's becoming really important to me all over again. 

Back history:we were "together" before

Okay , I had a great entry going until I pushed something and the screen transfered to something..... else ? 

But ANYWAYS.... 

Boi Oh Boi, I wouldn't call him a heart-breaker, but something else...hmm, the word escapes me. You'd think that someone who dis-likes themselves so much would hate life as well. Like those two aspects would go hand in hand. I would just like everyone to know that (minus one thing or another) life is going really well for me. I see my friends daily; no matter the hour or the day, I have talked to old enemies and new friends, and I feel great about having almost no enemies. Life looks up at the oddest times. Call it irony but I feel like I've been sent an opportunity underneath all of this madness. I like the thought but if I think about it too deeply I might skwuander(SP?) it all. I'll just look at it from a distance for now. 

There are three girls in my life that I could never ever let go of. I cherish them with every peice of me. Girls: Everything I hold dear belongs to you. (You three know who your are) Thank you for ALWAYS being there no matter how stupid I've been or the situation in hand alone. I love you.

And my story ends like this:
I love everyone that's in my life right now. I like the person I've become because the people that helped form what I am today. You all may not know it, but you make me soo happy, everyday. I'm so thankful.

Can You tell I'm in a lovey mood? 
Huff, off to work from 9 until.... whenever they want to let me go..er.

- + - + - + - + - + -
       Nin
- + - + - + - + - + -

I really hate a lot of people right now. I hate myself right now too. I'm just glad that this weekend is finally over and that things will only get better. I'm keeping a hopeful heart but I have a bad feeling that I'm only going to feel worse.

There's some crazy ass chick at work harassing everyone. Yay, let me tell you how I really want to go to work NOW. Yoo fucking HOO!

Oh yah, Happy Halloween bitches, hope you all have a great monday!

yah.... anyways, have fun, be safe, all that great shit.

Things will make you go up...than stupid things make you come down. But who ever wants to come down? from an addiction, a run- away problem, an.... anything. Everytime something goes wrong, people ... most.....maybe just me......want to float away, way up high where nothing and no one can find me. I'll only let you in if I wanted you in, no one will ever creep past my closed door.

There's so many things to be happy about now. Now, I'm on my cloud looking down because I'm up so high that I don't think I could leap much higher.

I decided that I would ignore the things I don't want to face; like I said, in my cloud, with the door closed shut, with the lock in a hidden place, and the key somewhere you'll never know.

I'm tired, so tired, and I won't stop being tired, until I take a day and sleep the day away, but I choose not to, I love everyone else so much that I just don't want to miss anything; never wanting to let you pass me by.

"It's possible I could've been another mistake... but wasn't it beautiful while it lasted?"

" Beautiful girl, it's 11:11; close your eyes and make a wish"

I guess I'm really sad just because, like always, I'm just lonely. And it's not because I can't get a guy, it's because I don't try and it's almost like I don't want to have someone, when in reality that's like the exact opposite of what I truley feel. I mean, I guess I'm just complicated. I know of ONE guy that I'm interested in and I feel soo pathetic because I'm interested in him because I'm a dumbey. Ahh, okay I'm a stupid face and I guess I should just like stop now before I feel like blowing my face up.

The shitty things that people will do when they are having more fun than with you...

Yah I drank last night, but I sure as hell didn't have fun. I sure wish I did. The whole purpose was to make a simple illusion for myself that I was having an amusing time, but you know; I guess shit happens. I got into a big fight and there was yellin and shit like that. I got pissed...

Lets Kill All Signs Of Ageing

- + - + - + - + - + - + -

As the days go by; the older I get, I just wish life would go at some sort of stand still. I wish I could embrace every second, every moment that I ever took for granted. I record all my memories so at any time; when memories are all I seem to hold, all I have to do is press rewind and everything that I experienced, loved and held so dear to me would be there and life suddenly would have its meaning again. Every image in my head comes in all a little bit clearer than when I first layed eyes on it. No matter what I've ever said out of spite, there hasn't been a moment that I've hated life; not a moment that I ever really wanted to die. Have you ever just road down a new road or path you've never taken before and just stopped to marvel at its beauty? It's almost like you're breathing in a whole new type of air; refreshing. How I see it, it's insane to sit and creep inside your own head and make new life realizations and to mature just from looking at things from all ends. I guess I do that a lot. For example, I think that no one can say they really regret doing or saying or hearing or anything; they just regret the timeing. If I wouldn't have heard that right then than I wouldn't have said anything or if she would have just said that any other time than now, it wouldn't have been so bad, or if I would have done that a few months down the road, it wouldn't have hurt so bad. We do or say things because at that particular time, we really wanted to and our impulse took over and we did it or said it anyways even if it ment hurting the ones you love. I think I would forgive almost anyone for making a mistake if they really did hurt over it or was sincerly sorry for whatever they have done or said. Its just the matter of time it would take for me to forgive them. I know I still am immature, but I think I like not knowing everything about anything. To be able to slide off subject or have no clue what you were talking about but acting as though you do any way. Or just taking the simple pleasure of not thinking about the actual consiquence of doing something you thought was fun, because in the end it was worth it anyways. I love this stage of life, where I don't have to do anything and be able to get by in life and have fun while doing so. I like knowing that I can do great things without trying to be the best. Knowing what I need to do and doing it. Not really caring what other people might think about it because it's my standards that I'm living up to, not the standards that someone else is pushing me to live up to; because when you start living by other peoples standards, thats when your fun gets sucked out of anything that you once enjoyed...Wow, life has so many bends and turns that you could sit and try to figure out life for years and not even come close to figuring everything out. I don't really plan on waisting life away to do that either...

- + - + - + - + - + - + -

And This Is What Dreams Are Made Of

- + - + - + - + - + - + -

Love Your Friends, Love Your Life, Have fun; Before You Know It You'll Be Dead
